pullrequest.title: Deprecate LoadLibrary change it by LoadLib

content.raw:
I’m not a fan of abbreviations in APIs \(since they tend to strike me as pointlessly lazy\), but I see why this change was unfortunately necessary.

Since the `plugin::Loader` class obviously exists to load plugin libraries, we could consider simply naming the function `Load`, but that would just be a personal preference for avoiding abbreviations, so it’s probably not a compelling change to make.
content.html:
I’m not a fan of abbreviations in APIs (since they tend to strike me as pointlessly lazy), but I see why this change was unfortunately necessary.

Since the plugin::Loader class obviously exists to load plugin libraries, we could consider simply naming the function Load, but that would just be a personal preference for avoiding abbreviations, so it’s probably not a compelling change to make.
